handCardList - Variable in class model.game.Game
Here is created the hand card list.
HandCardList - Class in model.handcard
This is a circular double linked list, which contains the hand card nodes.
HandCardList() - Constructor for class model.handcard.HandCardList
this is the creator of the list.
HandCardNode - Class in model.handcard
This class is the node of the hand card list.
HandCardNode(Card) - Constructor for class model.handcard.HandCardNode
this is the creator
handleCreateServer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MenuController
When the player select to create a game, this method will create the server and wait for a client.
handleInitGame(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MenuController
When the client press the init button, this method will create the first connection and verifies if the game exist.
handleJoinServer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MenuController
When the player select to join a game, this method will connect to the server.
handleNextCard(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When the buttonNextCard button is clicked, this method sets the next card on the circular double linked list and gets the image to display.
handleNextHistory(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When buttonNextHistory is pressed it gets the next history node and gets the information from it.
handlePreCard(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When the buttonPreviousCard button is clicked, this method sets the previous card on the circular double linked list and gets the image to display.
handlePreHistory(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When buttonPreviousHistory is pressed it gets the previous history node and gets the information from it.
handleSend(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When the mouse is clicked among the handcard, this method verifies if the player can buy the current card, then decreases the cost from the player's manÃ¡, send the information to the opponent, and verify the action of the card.
handleSkipTurn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
When the buttonSkipTurn button is pressed this method increase 25% of the players life and notifies the opponent that the player skip turn.
hBoxHandCard - Variable in class controller.GameController
This is a FXML HBox of the gameview that contains cardD02 and the next a previous buttons.
head - Variable in class model.handcard.HandCardList
this is the head of the handcard list.
head - Variable in class model.history.HistoryList
this is the head of the History list.
health - Variable in class model.cards.Spell
 
Hencheman - Class in model.cards
This class sets characteristics of hencheman type cards.
Hencheman(String) - Constructor for class model.cards.Hencheman
This creator obtains the methods and attributes from the class card and set the attack using the code of the card
Hencheman(Card) - Constructor for class model.cards.Hencheman
This creator obtains the methods and attributes from the class card and set the attack.
historyList - Variable in class model.game.Game
Here is created the history list.
HistoryList - Class in model.history
This is a double linked list which contains history nodes. the user can navigate forward to the end or backward to the beginning.
HistoryList() - Constructor for class model.history.HistoryList
this is the creator of the list.
HistoryNode - Class in model.history
This class creates nodes for the linked list of history, it contains all the information necessary to show the recent play
HistoryNode(String, String, int, int, String, short) - Constructor for class model.history.HistoryNode
This is the creator method where it builds a node with all the information necessary to show the recent play.
